title: Blended Learning Design for Integrated Academic Literacy Support Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: An online asynchronous course for elementary school teachers, integrating academic literacy with subject content. It utilizes a Moodle-based LMS and provides personalized support through learning analytics.

learning_goals: Learners can apply academic text analysis and critical evaluation skills with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can utilize academic expression conventions in subject-based writing with 90% compliance.
Learners can establish self-directed study plans using LMS-based learning analytics tools and achieve over 75% implementation rates.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
